tweet_text: These mRNA vaccines could be life-changing for individuals with a rare disease. Moderna is also trying to use mRNA to treat other disorders, and improve the efficacy of cancer therapeutics.
text_en: These mRNA vaccines could be life-changing for individuals with a rare disease. Moderna is also trying to use mRNA to treat other disorders, and improve the efficacy of cancer therapeutics.

tweet_text:
The treatment mRNA-3745 is meant to restore the deficient enzyme to its proper level. 

Mutations in the UGT1A1 gene cause Crigler-Najjar Syndrome Type 1 (CN-1), and Moderna's mRNA-3351 carries the sequence for the human mRNA. The idea, again, is to restore the missing protein.
text_en: The treatment mRNA-3745 is meant to restore the deficient enzyme to its proper level. Mutations in the UGT1A1 gene cause Crigler-Najjar Syndrome Type (CN-1), and Moderna's mRNA-3351 carries the sequence for the human mRNA. The idea, again, is to restore the missing protein.

tweet_text: The therapeutic mRNA-3745 was also developed by Moderna to treat glycogen storage disease type 1a, which is caused by a loss of a functional glucose-6-phosphatase enzyme. Dangerous imbalances of blood glucose occur in these patients.
text_en: The therapeutic mRNA-3745 was also developed by Moderna to treat glycogen storage disease type a, which is caused by a loss of a functional glucose-6-phosphatase enzyme. Dangerous imbalances of blood glucose occur in these patients.

tweet_text: Moderna has now finished enrolling volunteers in a Phase1/2 study of mRNA-3927, which aims to treat propionic acidemia (PA). The first participant in a study of mRNA-3705 to treat methylmalonic acidemia (MMA) has received their first dose.
text_en: Moderna has now finished enrolling volunteers in a Phase1/2 study of mRNA-3927, which aims to treat propionic acidemia (PA). The first participant in a study of mRNA-3705 to treat methylmalonic acidemia (MMA) has received their first dose.
